hackathon-description-text: The inaugural hackathon at NYU Shanghai.
hackathon-rules: Build something interesting within the competition span of 12 hours.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=East China Normal University, 3663 中山北路 Huashida, Putuo, China, 200030

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How creative, original, and innovative is the idea? Score of 1-5.
How technically difficult was it to build the product? Score of 1-5.
How well did the team present together? Score of 1-5.
How polished and well-designed is the product? Score of 1-5.

hackathon-location-address: East China Normal University, 3663 中山北路 Huashida, Putuo, China, 200030
hackathon-description-header: Learn, collaborate, hack. What can you dream up in 12 hours?
